title: Ordering Coffee at a Cafe
description: Practice ordering drinks and snacks at a coffee shop

roles.ai: Barista at a cozy coffee shop

learning_objectives: Ask about menu options and customizations

key_vocabulary.example: What do you recommend for first-timers?
Could I get some extra ice?

stages.name: Greeting
stages.ai_prompt: Customer approaches the counter. Greet them warmly and ask what they would like to order.
stages.ai_opening: Hi there! Welcome to Sunny Cafe. What can I get for you today?
stages.learning_tip: 인사 후 'I'd like...' 또는 'Could I have...'로 주문을 시작하세요
suggested_responses: Hi! I'd like a latte, please.
Hello! Could I see the menu?

stages.name: Customization
stages.ai_prompt: Ask about size and any customizations for the order.
stages.learning_tip: 사이즈는 small, medium, large 또는 tall, grande, venti로 말해요
suggested_responses: A tall iced latte with an extra shot.

stages.name: Payment
stages.ai_prompt: Tell the customer the total and ask about payment method.
stages.learning_tip: 'I'll pay by card' 또는 'Here you go'를 사용하세요
suggested_responses: Can I pay with Apple Pay?

completion_message: Great job! You successfully ordered at a cafe! 잘했어요! 카페 주문을 성공적으로 완료했습니다!
ai_personality: Friendly and patient barista. Speak clearly and use simple vocabulary appropriate for beginners. Offer help if the customer seems unsure.
